Hi! I'm Jeremy Kintana.

I'm a highly driven CS student at the University of Wisconsin-Madison.

Previously, I interned at AI Camp. I created historical data reports using Python Pandas and Matplotlib, contributed to a codebase that utilized Django and PostgreSQL, and worked in a Scrum environment.

Currently, I'm an active member of the Data Science for Sustainable Development Club and the Effective Altruism Club. I'm passionate about educational learning theory, programming, and anything science fiction or philosophy.

At the moment, I'm concerned with two questions:
  • 1. How can I do the most good in my lifetime?
  • 2. What is the most effective way to learn new things?

Want to get in touch? Email me at kintana@wisc.edu or message me on LinkedIn.
